label: applicableDisposalInstructions
comment: Disposal instructions applicable to this product batch.
Disposal instructions applicable to this trade product.
Disposal instructions for this supply chain packaging.

rangeIncludes.comment: A set of instructions detailing how to properly dispose of a material.

domainIncludes.comment: A group of products considered or dealt with together.
Any material with which supply chain goods are packaged, such as a box or bubble wrap.
Any tangible output or service produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process for trade purposes.
